productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #28,475 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #320 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels like cashmere!
reviews.reviewText: This sleeveless sweater is so much better than I was expecting. It is extremely well-made with beautiful stitching detail at the shoulder/sleeves. The knit fabric feels just like cashmere. It is so soft! It feels so amazing against your skin and is extremely comfortable. I ordered the usual size using the size chart as a guide. It does seem to run a bit large. If you are on the lower end of your Size selection you may want to consider sizing down. this is machine wash, which again having felt the fabric, surprises me. This simple design will match with anything. Can be dressed up or more casual. I wholeheartedly recommend this sweater. You won’t be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Sweater Vest
reviews.reviewText: The product came quickly and as described. I received the green one, and the color is accurate to the picture online. The material is soft and nice to the touch, not scratchy. It is a good quality sweater.The fit is just a little awkward, as the sweater is much bigger at the shoulder than the waist. It is also shorter in length, I am 5'4", so this was not bad for me, but it may be good information for people who are taller.All in all I love it, with some wide leg jeans it totally recreates the look I loved in the 90's!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Sleeveless Sweater
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the Dokotoo Women's Sleeveless Knit Pullover in Black, size XLarge; and I am glad that I did. I usually wear a 16w-18w and this XLarge fits me perfectly; and it is so super soft. This black sweater is V Neck, sleeveless style; with black and white stripe ribbing around the V-Neck as well as at the ends of both of the short sleeves. This is a very beautiful sleeveless sweater that I will wear either as a top with slacks, jeans, skirt; or, with a jacket and/or a 2-piece outfit. I easily rate this 5 out of 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars adds cozy warmth & style to my undershirt
reviews.reviewText: Glad it doesn't really look that preppy on me as I thought. The size XL also fit me well, hiding my wide waist and short torso of my petite apple-shaped figure that fits between an XL and 2XL. What's even better is that it didn't really shrink, after I wrongly washed it in warm washer water and dried it on high heat. It's supposed to be hand-wash only and hang-/line-dry. I can wear any solid-colored shirt with this Black vest with white lining and look more stylish. I've worn this with short sleeves and long sleeves. Love how cozy, warming, and soft its viscose, polyester, and polyamide fabric is. IT's soft stretchiness is probably from the polyamide. Maybe even why it didn't really shrink much.Immensely recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this sweater. The fit is loose on the top and a bit fitted on the bottom which is nice so it doesn’t look frumpy. The white trim on the beige color is pretty. material is on the thicker side. Not see through at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The material is soft, I'll give it that - but the fit (for me) was kind of 'meh' looking. More frumpy than fabulous, unfortunately. I think if I had a longer torso it might look better, so that's something to consider. It's made very well, though, I just wish it looked better on me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The top is so cute and the color is great for Fall. It is very comfortable and made of nice soft material. It looks amazing if I wear it with jeans or slacks. Overall, I love the softness of this lightweight sweater. It’s so cute on too. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and stretchy
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute sweater vest. It has a vibrant color, great detail around the neck line, a fun v neck (both front and back). The sweater is so buttery soft and also crazy stretchy. It's a very comfortable top. It's a little long, so you'll likely have to tuck it in. But this will be a nice office option once warmer weather rolls around again!
